channel.title: Designing - web templates/sites and logo's - for a small profit
channel.description:
[center]hi guys,
firstly and most inportantly i would just like to say this if this is seen as spam please delete it, i am doing this solely by myself and no other people or communitys will be involved.
[glow=red,2,300]My history of web design -[/glow] i have around 2 years of web design and logo making exp and am offering my services and mine alone to design and built a site for a small price. I will be providing the following services -
Logo - custom made frontpage - frontpage to your site full site - a full website, each page with the same template to the front (may differ if desired) images - custom images made
and a wide variety more, please either post a query or order or you can pm me. My preffered payment option is paypal but i may accept other payments (e.g. rs2 gp or Egold)
Before i end this i would just like to make it clear that i would not usally offer my services for money but i kinda need to right know :),
thank you for looking, and as i said before if this conflicts with any of our rule's pelase remove this topic.[/center]

item.title: Designing - web templates/sites and logo's - for a small profit
item.dc:creator: @arraness14 arraness14
item.description:
@arraness14 wrote:

Man…your not even finishing mt template first and your going around maknig templates for more people…

Read full topic
item.source: Designing - web templates/sites and logo's - for a small profit
